Data analysis is the process of collecting, cleaning, and organizing data to uncover patterns, insights, and trends that can help individuals and organizations make informed decisions. It involves examining raw data to find answers to specific questions, identify potential problems, or discover opportunities for improvement.  


Data analysts transform raw data into actionable insights to help organisations improve operations, strategies, and customer experiences. Core skills include statistical analysis, critical thinking, data visualisation, and proficiency in tools like Excel, SQL, Python, and Tableau.


Learning data analysis skills is crucial for career building in today's data-driven world, both for professional positions and managers of all levels.


Marketing Data Analysis and Data Analytics are closely related, but with a specific focus. Here's a breakdown:

Marketing Data Analysis:

  • Focus: Analyzing data specifically related to marketing efforts. This includes data from campaigns, customer interactions, website traffic, social media, and more.

  • Goal: To understand the effectiveness of marketing strategies, identify trends, and gain insights into customer behavior to optimize campaigns and improve ROI.


Data Analytics:

  • Focus: A broader field that involves collecting, organizing, and analyzing data from various sources to extract meaningful insights and make informed decisions.

  • Goal: To identify patterns, trends, and correlations in data to solve business problems, improve processes, and gain a competitive advantage.


Importance for Companies:

  • Enhanced Customer Understanding: Data analytics provides deep insights into customer behavior, preferences, and needs, allowing companies to personalize marketing efforts and build stronger customer relationships.

  • Improved Campaign Effectiveness: By analyzing campaign data, companies can identify what's working and what's not, optimize campaigns in real-time, and maximize ROI.

  • Data-Driven Decision Making: Data analytics empowers companies to make informed decisions based on evidence rather than intuition, leading to better outcomes.

  • Competitive Advantage: Companies that effectively leverage data analytics gain a competitive edge by understanding their market better, identifying new opportunities, and adapting quickly to changing conditions.


Importance for Career Building:

  • High Demand: Data analytics skills are in high demand across industries, including marketing. Developing these skills can open up a wide range of career opportunities.

  • Valuable Skills: Data analysis and interpretation are crucial skills for marketing professionals. They enable you to demonstrate the impact of your work, make data-driven recommendations, and contribute to strategic decision-making.

  • Career Advancement: Proficiency in data analytics can accelerate career progression and lead to leadership roles.

  • Increased Earning Potential: Professionals with data analytics skills often command higher salaries due to the value they bring to organizations.


Marketing Data Analysis and Data Analytics are essential for both companies and individuals in today's data-driven world. Companies that leverage these skills gain a competitive advantage, while individuals who develop these skills enhance their career prospects and earning potential.

courseDetails.title: Food Biochemistry
courseDetails.shortDescription: A Multidisciplinary Approach to Food Science
courseDetails.longDescription:
Overview:

Food biochemistry is the study of the chemical and biological processes that occur in food. It is a multidisciplinary field that encompasses aspects of chemistry, biology, microbiology, and engineering. Food biochemistry is used to understand the nutritional value of food, the effects of processing on food, and the causes of food spoilage.

The Food Biochemistry course is a fascinating and in-depth exploration of the chemical processes and reactions that occur in food and its components. This course delves into the molecular structures, interactions, and transformations that take place during food processing, storage, and consumption. With a strong emphasis on the scientific principles underlying food composition, nutritional value, and quality, this course provides a solid foundation for understanding the intricate relationship between food and biochemistry.

Benefits of Learning:

By studying Food Biochemistry, you will gain a profound understanding of how food components such as proteins, carbohydrates, lipids, vitamins, and minerals undergo chemical changes during processing, cooking, and digestion. This knowledge will enable you to evaluate and improve the nutritional value, sensory qualities, and safety of food products. Additionally, you will develop critical thinking and analytical skills that are highly valued in the food industry.

There are many benefits to learning food biochemistry. For one, it can help you to better understand the nutritional value of food. This knowledge can help you to make healthier food choices for yourself and your family. Additionally, food biochemistry can help you to understand the effects of processing on food. This knowledge can help you to choose processed foods that are healthier and more nutritious. Finally, food biochemistry can help you to understand the causes of food spoilage. This knowledge can help you to prevent food spoilage and to ensure that your food is safe to eat.

Other benefits of learning food biochemistry include:

  • Gaining a deeper understanding of the science behind food production and processing.

  • Developing the skills necessary to work in the food industry.

  • Qualifying for entry-level positions in food science, nutrition, and food engineering.

  • Expanding your knowledge of chemistry, biology, and microbiology.

  • Preparing for graduate studies in food science or a related field.

Who Can Learn:

The Food Biochemistry course is designed for individuals who have a strong interest in the science behind food and its impact on human health. It is suitable for students pursuing degrees in food science, nutrition, biochemistry, or related fields. Professionals in the food industry who wish to enhance their knowledge and skills in food analysis, product development, quality control, and research will also find this course valuable.

Career Scope:

A solid foundation in Food Biochemistry opens up a wide range of career opportunities in various sectors of the food industry. Graduates can pursue rewarding careers as food chemists, research scientists, quality assurance managers, product developers, food analysts, and regulatory compliance specialists. Furthermore, opportunities exist in academia, where individuals can contribute to research, teaching, and consultancy in the field of food biochemistry.

The career scope for food biochemists is growing. There are many job opportunities in the food industry, including food processing, food safety, and nutrition. Additionally, food biochemists can work in academia, research, and government.

Some of the job titles that food biochemists can hold include:

  • Food scientist

  • Nutritionist

  • Food technologist

  • Food safety officer

  • Research scientist

  • Professor

  • Government regulator

Salary Package with Job Role in India and Foreign:

In India, the salary package for professionals with expertise in Food Biochemistry varies depending on factors such as job role, years of experience, and the organization's scale. Entry-level positions may offer a salary range of INR 3,00,000 to INR 5,00,000 per annum, while experienced professionals in managerial or research roles can earn salaries upwards of INR 10,00,000 per annum.

Internationally, the salary package for individuals in the field of Food Biochemistry is highly competitive. In countries like the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, and Australia, professionals can earn annual salaries ranging from $50,000 to $100,000 or more, depending on their qualifications and expertise.

Requirements to Study:

To enroll in the Food Biochemistry course, you typically need a background in science at the undergraduate level. Most institutions require applicants to hold a bachelor's degree in a relevant field such as food science, biochemistry, chemistry, or nutrition. Some courses may have specific prerequisite subjects or knowledge requirements, which vary depending on the institution. Additionally, proficiency in scientific research methods and laboratory techniques is beneficial for students studying Food Biochemistry.

Key Features:

  • Comprehensive understanding of the chemical processes and reactions in food.

  • Exploration of food components and their transformations during processing and digestion.

  • Analysis of the impact of food biochemistry on nutritional value and sensory qualities.

  • Hands-on experience with laboratory techniques used in food analysis.

  • Application of food biochemistry principles to product development and quality control.

  • Integration of scientific knowledge with practical skills relevant to the food industry.

  • Access to expert faculty and resources for in-depth learning.

  • Opportunities for research and practical projects to enhance understanding and skills.
targetAudiences: The Food Biochemistry course is designed for individuals who have a strong interest in the science behind food and its impact on human health.
It is suitable for students pursuing degrees in food science, nutrition, biochemistry, or related fields.
Professionals in the food industry who wish to enhance their knowledge and skills in food analysis, product development, quality control, and research will also find this course valuable.

courseDetails.title: CRISPR Cas9 Technology
courseDetails.shortDescription: CRISPR Cas9 Technology
courseDetails.longDescription:
What is CRISPR-Cas9?

CRISPR-Cas9 is a unique technology that enables geneticists and medical researchers to edit parts of the genome by removing, adding or altering sections of the DNA sequence.

It is currently the simplest, most versatile and precise method of genetic manipulation and is therefore causing a buzz in the science world.

CRISPR-Cas9 is a genome editing tool that is creating a buzz in the science world. It is faster, cheaper and more accurate than previous techniques of editing DNA and has a wide range of potential applications.


How does it work?

1. The CRISPR-Cas9 system consists of two key molecules that introduce a change (mutation) into the DNA. These are:

⦁ an enzyme called Cas9. This acts as a pair of ‘molecular scissors’ that can cut the two strands of DNA at a specific location in the genome so that bits of DNA can then be added or removed.

⦁ a piece of RNA called guide RNA (gRNA). This consists of a small piece of pre-designed RNA sequence located within a longer RNA scaffold. The scaffold part binds to DNA and the pre-designed sequence ‘guides’ Cas9 to the right part of the genome. This makes sure that the Cas9 enzyme cuts at the right point in the genome.

2. The guide RNA is designed to find and bind to a specific sequence in the DNA. The guide RNA has RNA bases that are complementary to those of the target DNA sequence in the genome. This means that, at least in theory, the guide RNA will only bind to the target sequence and no other regions of the genome.

3. The Cas9 follows the guide RNA to the same location in the DNA sequence and makes a cut across both strands of the DNA.

4. At this stage the cell recognizes that the DNA is damaged and tries to repair it.

5. Scientists can use the DNA repair machinery to introduce changes to one or more genes in the genome of a cell of interest.


What other techniques are there for altering genes?

Over the years scientists have learned about genetics and gene function by studying the effects of changes in DNA.

If you can create a change in a gene, either in a cell line or a whole organism, it is possible to then study the effect of that change to understand what the function of that gene is.

For a long time geneticists used chemicals or radiation to cause mutations. However, they had no way of controlling where in the genome the mutation would occur.

For several years scientists have been using ‘gene targeting’ to introduce changes in specific places in the genome, by removing or adding either whole genes or single bases.

Traditional gene targeting has been very valuable for studying genes and genetics, however it takes a long time to create a mutation and is fairly expensive.

Several ‘gene editing’ technologies have recently been developed to improve gene targeting methods, including CRISPR-Cas systems, transcription activator-like effector nucleases (TALENs) and zinc-finger nucleases (ZFNs).

The CRISPR-Cas9 system currently stands out as the fastest, cheapest and most reliable system for ‘editing’ genes.


What are the applications and implications?

CRISPR-Cas9 has a lot of potential as a tool for treating a range of medical conditions that have a genetic component, including cancer, hepatitis B or even high cholesterol.

Many of the proposed applications involve editing the genomes of somatic (non-reproductive) cells but there has been a lot of interest in and debate about the potential to edit germline (reproductive) cells.

Because any changes made in germline cells will be passed on from generation to generation it has important ethical implications.

Carrying out gene editing in germline cells is currently illegal in the UK and most other countries.

By contrast, the use of CRISPR-Cas9 and other gene editing technologies in somatic cells is uncontroversial. Indeed they have already been used to treat human disease on a small number of exceptional and/or life-threatening cases.


What’s the future of CRISPR-Cas9?

It is likely to be many years before CRISPR-Cas9 is used routinely in humans.

Much research is still focusing on its use in animal models or isolated human cells, with the aim to eventually use the technology to routinely treat diseases in humans.

There is a lot of work focusing on eliminating ‘off-target’ effects, where the CRISPR-Cas9 system cuts at a different gene to the one that was intended to be edited.

courseDetails.title: Ethical Hacking: Hack Linux Systems
courseDetails.shortDescription: Get Root on Linux systems
courseDetails.longDescription:
Linux is one of the most widely used systems in the world. Do you know how to hack it? Hacking linux is hard work. We make it easy. In this course you will learn how to execute a basic hack and then different techniques you can use to become administrator (root) in the Linux system.

It is recommended that you have some basic knowledge of the Linux command line before starting this course. We will be using a Linux based system called Kali Linux. Kali is a security and hacking orientated system.

You can use what you learn in this course to hack other Linux computers or to increase the security of your own Linux computer. In order to prevent getting hacked, you have to think like a hacker. Whichever your purpose, this course will leverage  your skills from basic Linux user to knowledgeable on compromising Linux systems.

Once you hacked the system, you will want to increase your privileges on the system. Instead of a regular user, why not become administrator (root) on the system you just hacked?  In this course you will learn different techniques that let you do that.

We will cover the following:

courseDetails.title: ChatGPTとAI: 究極のAIトレーニング
courseDetails.shortDescription: AIを極めよう：ChatGPT、Dall-e、Claude、Gemini AIの完全ガイド
courseDetails.longDescription:
ChatGPTと生成AIの究極トレーニング:

毎日の頼れるパートナー、優れた個人アシスタントと共に新しい始まりの準備はできていますか？タスクを驚異的な精度とスピードでこなすAIが、あなたのメールや記事、レポートの作成から、インスピレーションあふれる画像の生成、複雑なデータの分析、カスタムソリューションのコーディング、様々な問題の解決までをサポートします。これにより、あなたは本当に重要なことに集中することができます。


AIのすべての恩恵を享受するためには、まずAIを使いこなす必要があります。多くの人々は最初は興味を持ち、2〜3回のプロンプトを試してみるだけで、AIの真の可能性を見いだすことなく興味を失ってしまいます。その背景には、最適な結果を得るための技術や方法、設定についての知識不足があることが多いです。

このトレーニングの目的は、AIと効果的にコミュニケーションを取り、最適に設定し、最大限に活用するためのすべての鍵を提供することです。


この目標を達成するために、私はコンパクトでダイナミックなカリキュラムを設計しました。このカリキュラムでは、AIの最適な利用法に必要な知識とスキルを習得できます。トレーニングでは以下のことを学びます：

  • AIに明確なリクエストを行い、最良の回答を得る方法

  • ChatGPTを信頼できる教師、共同創設者、アナリストに設定する方法

  • 多様なアイデアを生成し、仕事の質を向上させ、生産性を高め、より速く、より適切かつ効率的にする方法

  • ChatGPTのマルチモーダル機能を活用し、テキストや音声での対話、画像の送信と解釈を行う方法

  • Dall-eやCopilotを使って最良の画像を生成する方法

  • ChatGPTの有料版の代替案を見つける方法

  • Copilot、Claude、Geminiなど他のAIを探索する

  • ChatGPTを自分の好みや特定のニーズに合わせてカスタマイズし、個別の回答を得る方法

  • GPTsを利用してChatGPTを強化する方法：これらのアプリケーションの使い方や、開発者でなくても作成する方法

  • API管理、プレイグラウンド、ExcelやGoogle Sheetsなど他のソフトウェアとの統合など、少し技術的なトピックをトレーニングの最後に扱う

そして、これらすべてが初心者でもアクセス可能であることを確認します。


このトレーニングには以下が含まれます：

  • 実践的なデモンストレーション

  • ダウンロード可能な技術資料や実践ガイド

  • そして何より、定期的に更新されるコンテンツ


[更新情報：GPT4の次世代モデルであるGPT4oの使用に関する動画を追加しました]

要約すると、あなたは明確でアクセスしやすく、魅力的なコースを受講しようとしています。このコースは基本概念を網羅しながらも冗長ではなく、詳細な内容です。初心者から高度なテクニックを求める方まで、ChatGPTをマスターするために必要な唯一のトレーニングです。

自己紹介：

私はヤシン・ロシュドと申します。多くの学習者がプロフェッショナルな目標を達成するのを支援してきたトレーニング機関の創設者です。

私はテクノロジーに情熱を持っています。金融の修士号を取得し、コンサルティングや投資ファンドでの経験を経た後、ウェブ開発のトレーニングを受け、数百時間にわたってAIの発見と使用に取り組んできました。

今日は、過去数年間で学んだことをできるだけ分かりやすくお伝えしたいと思います。


認定と保証：

  • このトレーニングを修了すると、LinkedInでも共有できる認定証を受け取ることができます。

  • このトレーニングはリスクフリーで、30日間の「満足保証」付きです。

  • トレーニング、ダウンロード可能なリソース、将来の更新に生涯アクセスできます。

非常に役立つ技術をマスターし、より効率的で生産的になり、欠かせない存在になるための一歩が、今ここにあります。


コースの各セクションの詳細:


ChatGPTのクイックスタート

数本のビデオでChatGPTをすばやく習得する方法を学びます。直感的なインターフェイスに飛び込み、最初のプロンプトを作成してAIの力を最大限に活用しましょう。テーブルの生成、ブレインストーミング、アイデアの生成、テキストの翻訳と校正、さまざまなコンテンツの作成など、AIを使えば迅速かつ効果的に作業が進みます。ChatGPTがあなたの就職活動を支援し、プロフェッショナルなニーズに合わせて効率を高める方法を発見しましょう。メールや手紙から記事、ソーシャルメディアの投稿、プログラミングコードの作成まで、多様なコンテンツを生成する能力を持つChatGPTを活用する方法を学びます。


プロンプトエンジニアリングの基礎

なぜプロンプトエンジニアリングが重要なのか、その理由を学び、ChatGPTを真の専門家に変える方法を理解します。コンテキストと目標の重要性を理解し、インタラクションを構造化する方法、フォーマットと温度を調整してプロンプトを最適化し、モデルの創造性のレベルを変える方法を発見します。トーンとスタイルをマスターしてインタラクションをパーソナライズし、より適切な回答を得るための5つの実用的なヒントを提供します。


プロンプトエンジニアリングの高度な技術

このセクションでは、他のプロンプトを生成するプロンプトを作成する方法を学びます。リバースエンジニアリングの手法、ウェブ検索機能、画像の解釈など、さまざまな高度な技術を学びます。


Dall-e

Dall-eを使った画像生成について学びます。平均的な結果から美的でインスピレーションを与える作品に変える方法、画像の部分を簡単かつ迅速に修正する方法、結果を最適化する方法を学びます。フィクションや漫画のキャラクターの生成を連続性を持って行う技術など、高度なテクニックも学び、より印象的な結果を得る方法を学びます。


ChatGPTとAIの限界に対するソリューション

ChatGPTや他のAIモデルには限界や弱点があります。このセクションでは、それらが何であるか、そしてそれを克服する方法を学びます。


ChatGPTの興味深い機能

チャットの共有機能を設定してChatGPTを共同利用する方法を学びます。ChatGPTのモバイルアプリを最大限に活用し、そのすべてのオプションを探ります。最後に、AIを使用して独自のコンテンツを作成し、盗用や重複コンテンツを避ける方法を学びます。


CopilotとBing

CopilotはChatGPTの有料機能や高度な機能に対する興味深い代替案を提供します。MicrosoftとOpenAIの提携を活用して、Bing検索エンジンに統合された高度なAI機能にアクセスする方法を学びます。


Gemini、Claude、Mistral、その他

前のセクションに続き、GoogleのGeminiやAnthropicのClaudeなど、他のAIを調査します。それらの強みと弱みを理解し、ChatGPTよりも優先して使用するケーススタディを検討します。


ChatGPTのカスタム指示

ChatGPTをあなたのニーズや期待に合わせてカスタマイズする方法を学びます。カスタム指示を設定してインタラクションをパーソナライズし、最適な使用のために考慮すべき注意点を発見します。


GPTs

GPTsの仕組みを学びます。これらの専門的なミニアプリケーションは、時にはChatGPTを超えることがあります。ステップバイステップで独自のGPTを作成する方法を学びます。ChatGPTの能力を最大限に引き出すためのAPIコールをマスターし、最終的にはGPTを収益化する方法や、ChatGPTを活用してお金を稼ぐ方法も学びます。


API管理とプレイグラウンド

ChatGPTのプレイグラウンドを探索し、新機能を発見します。段階的に難易度を上げてChatGPTのAPIを呼び出す方法を学びます。これにより、ChatGPTをインターフェース外で使用したり、別のサイトにチャットボットを作成したり、Google SheetsやExcelなどの他のソフトウェアに統合したりすることができます。
targetAudiences: AIとChatGPTをマスターしたいすべての人に。このトレーニングはすべてのレベルに対応しています。

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT e IA Generativa: guía de IA y prompt engineering
courseDetails.shortDescription: Domina la IA y el Prompt engineering: ChatGPT, Dall-e, Copilot, Gemini | El curso esencial de IA generativa
courseDetails.longDescription:
Formación Integral en ChatGPT e IA Generativa

¿Te imaginas empezar cada día con un asistente personal sumamente talentoso, listo para ejecutar tus tareas con una precisión y rapidez insuperables?

Una IA que puede redactar tus correos, artículos o informes, crear imágenes inspiradoras, analizar datos complejos, programar soluciones a medida y resolver innumerables problemas, permitiéndote enfocarte en lo que realmente importa.

Para disfrutar de todos estos beneficios, primero hay que dominar la IA. Muchas personas se entusiasman, realizan un par de comandos y abandonan, sin llegar a descubrir el verdadero potencial de la inteligencia artificial. Este comportamiento suele deberse a la falta de conocimiento sobre las técnicas, métodos y configuraciones que permiten obtener los mejores resultados.

El objetivo de esta formación es proporcionarte todas las herramientas para comunicarte eficazmente con la IA, configurarla de la mejor manera y explotarla al máximo. Para lograrlo, he diseñado un curso conciso y dinámico que te permitirá desarrollar los conocimientos y habilidades esenciales para un uso óptimo de la IA.


Durante esta formación, aprenderás:

  • Formulación de solicitudes claras a la IA: Cómo redactar peticiones precisas para obtener las mejores respuestas posibles.

  • Configuración de ChatGPT: Convertir ChatGPT en tu profesor, cofundador o analista de confianza.

  • Generación de ideas y productividad: Técnicas para generar múltiples ideas y mejorar tu trabajo, aumentando tu productividad, velocidad, relevancia y eficacia.

  • Aprovechamiento de la multimodalidad de ChatGPT: Cómo escribirle, hablarle, escucharlo, enviarle imágenes y pedirle que las interprete.

  • Generación de imágenes con Dall-e y Copilot: Estrategias para obtener las mejores imágenes posibles.

  • Alternativas a la versión de pago de ChatGPT: Cómo encontrar y utilizar opciones interesantes.

  • Exploración de otras IA: Conocer y utilizar otras herramientas como Copilot, Claude o Gemini.

  • Adaptación de ChatGPT a tus necesidades: Personalizar ChatGPT según tus preferencias y necesidades específicas para obtener respuestas a medida.

  • Potenciación de ChatGPT con los GPTs: Uso de aplicaciones GPT y creación de estas, incluso sin ser desarrollador.

  • Temas técnicos avanzados: Gestión de API, uso del playground, e integración de ChatGPT en otros software como Excel o Google Sheets.

  • Accesibilidad para todos: Todo el contenido está diseñado para ser accesible, incluso para principiantes.


En esta formación, encontrarás:

  • Demostraciones concretas: Ejemplos prácticos y casos de uso.

  • Fichas técnicas y guías prácticas: Material descargable para facilitar tu aprendizaje.

[Actualización: He añadido videos sobre el uso del modelo GPT4o que sucede a la versión GPT4]

En resumen, estás a punto de iniciar un curso claro, accesible y atractivo. Está diseñado para cubrir los conceptos esenciales sin extenderse demasiado, ofreciendo el equilibrio perfecto. No importa tu nivel inicial, ya seas principiante o busques técnicas avanzadas, esta es la única formación que necesitarás para dominar ChatGPT.


Mi presentación:

Me llamo Yassine, soy el fundador de una organización de formación que ha ayudado a miles de estudiantes a alcanzar sus objetivos profesionales. Soy un apasionado de la tecnología. Después de obtener un máster en finanzas y adquirir experiencia en consultoría y fondos de inversión, me formé en desarrollo web y dediqué cientos de horas a descubrir y utilizar IA. Hoy quiero transmitirte, de la manera más clara posible, todo lo que he aprendido en estos últimos años.


Certificación y garantía:

  • Al completar esta formación, recibirás una certificación que podrás compartir en LinkedIn.

  • Esta formación es sin riesgo, ya que cuentas con una garantía de "satisfacción o reembolso" de 30 días.

  • Tendrás acceso de por vida a la formación y a los recursos descargables.

Estás a un clic de dominar una tecnología extremadamente útil que te hará más eficiente, más productivo y, simplemente, indispensable. ¡Inscríbete ahora y comienza tu viaje hacia la maestría en IA!



Detalle de las diferentes secciones de este curso:


Introducción rápida a ChatGPT

Descubre cómo dominar rápidamente ChatGPT en solo unos pocos videos. Sumérgete en su interfaz intuitiva y aprende a crear tus primeros comandos para aprovechar al máximo el poder de la IA. Ya sea para generar tablas, hacer lluvias de ideas, generar nuevas ideas, traducir y corregir textos, o redactar diversos contenidos, serás más rápido y eficiente con la IA. Descubre cómo ChatGPT puede asistirte en tu búsqueda de empleo y adaptarse a tus necesidades profesionales para aumentar tu eficacia. Verás que ChatGPT es capaz de crear una multitud de contenidos, desde correos y cartas hasta artículos y publicaciones para redes sociales, sin olvidar la redacción de código informático.

Fundamentos del prompt engineering

Aprende por qué el prompt engineering es esencial y cómo puede transformar a ChatGPT en un verdadero experto. Comprende la importancia del contexto y los objetivos para estructurar tus interacciones, y descubre cómo ajustar el formato y la temperatura para optimizar tus comandos y variar el nivel de creatividad del modelo. Personaliza tus interacciones dominando el tono y el estilo, y benefíciate de 5 consejos prácticos para obtener respuestas aún más pertinentes de ChatGPT.

Técnicas avanzadas de prompt engineering

En esta sección, veremos cómo crear comandos que generen otros comandos. Estudiaremos la metodología de reverse engineering, las funcionalidades de búsqueda web, la interpretación de imágenes y muchas otras técnicas avanzadas.

Dall-e

Continuaremos con la generación de imágenes con Dall-e. Verás cómo pasar de un resultado promedio a obras estéticas e inspiradoras, cómo modificar de manera simple y rápida porciones de imágenes y optimizar tus resultados. También estudiaremos técnicas avanzadas que te permitirán, por ejemplo, crear una continuidad en la generación de un personaje de ficción o cómic, para obtener resultados aún más impresionantes.

Soluciones a las limitaciones de ChatGPT y la IA

ChatGPT y otros modelos de inteligencia artificial tienen límites y debilidades. En esta sección, exploraremos cuáles son y cómo superarlas.

Funcionalidades interesantes en ChatGPT

Aprende a configurar las funcionalidades de compartir tus conversaciones para un uso colaborativo de ChatGPT. Aprovecha al máximo la aplicación móvil de ChatGPT explorando todas las opciones que ofrece. Finalmente, descubre métodos para crear contenido único con la IA evitando cualquier forma de plagio o contenido duplicado.

Copilot y Bing

Copilot ofrece varias alternativas interesantes a las funcionalidades avanzadas y de pago de ChatGPT. Veremos cómo aprovechar la colaboración entre Microsoft y OpenAI para acceder a funcionalidades avanzadas de inteligencia artificial integradas en el motor de búsqueda Bing.

Gemini, Claude, Mistral y otros

En la continuidad de la sección anterior, estudiaremos otras IA como Gemini de Google o Claude de Anthropic. Veremos sus fortalezas, debilidades y analizaremos varios casos de uso para saber en qué situaciones es preferible utilizarlas en lugar de ChatGPT.

Instrucciones personalizadas en ChatGPT

Adapta ChatGPT a tus necesidades y expectativas. Aprende a personalizar tus interacciones configurando tus instrucciones personalizadas. Descubre también los puntos de precaución a considerar para un uso óptimo.

Los GPTs

Descubre el funcionamiento de los GPTs, esas mini aplicaciones hiperespecializadas que a veces pueden superar a ChatGPT. Aprende a crear tu propio GPT paso a paso. Domina las llamadas a la API para maximizar las capacidades de ChatGPT y descubre al final de esta sección cómo monetizar tus GPTs y, en general, cómo ganar dinero gracias a ChatGPT.

Gestión de API y Playground

Explora el playground de ChatGPT y descubre las nuevas funcionalidades que ofrece. Aprende a hacer llamadas a la API de ChatGPT con niveles de dificultad crecientes. Así, podrás utilizar ChatGPT fuera de la interfaz, crear un chatbot en otro sitio o incluso integrar ChatGPT en otros software como Google Sheets o Excel, por ejemplo.
targetAudiences: A cualquier persona que desee dominar la IA y ChatGPT. Esta formación es para todos los niveles.

courseDetails.title: How Websites Work
courseDetails.shortDescription: Make Your Own Websites
courseDetails.longDescription:
Websites are everywhere these days. They provide information and interact with users through different platforms, such as computers, tablets, and smartphones. A website is a network of linked web pages that users access through their web browsers. A user can access a website only when he or she has a web browser to process the code used to create the website’s content.

A website is made up of HTML code, which stands for Hypertext Markup Language. HTML is the main language used to create websites. This code defines the look and behavior of a website’s pages using tags and attributes. Web pages can be viewed in different web browsers— such as Microsoft Internet Explorer or Google Chrome.

In this course you will learn how websites work and be able to create your own web pages. You will understand basics like HTML, JavaScript and CSS. On top of that, you will learn about Security vulnerabilities that sometimes occur with web pages. Indeed, this is not just a Web Development course but it has a Cyber Security components as well!

If you are new to Web Development and Cyber Security, this course is for you! No prior knowledge required. The course includes exercises that let you play around with HTML code and more.
targetAudiences: Beginner Web Developers

Financial analysis is the process of evaluating businesses, projects, budgets, and other finance-related entities to determine their performance and suitability. It involves using various tools and techniques to assess the financial health of an organization, forecast future trends, and support decision-making.  


Key aspects of financial analysis include:

Assessing profitability: Evaluating a company's ability to generate profits over time, considering revenues, costs, and expenses.

Analyzing liquidity: Determining an organization's capacity to meet its short-term financial obligations and maintain sufficient cash flow.

Examining solvency: Assessing a company's long-term financial stability and ability to repay its debts.

Evaluating efficiency: Measuring how effectively a company utilizes its resources to generate revenues and manage expenses.

Forecasting future performance: Projecting financial outcomes based on historical data, market trends, and other relevant factors.


Financial analysis and management, especially when focused on business partnership, are crucial for the success of any company, but particularly for those in the dynamic and fast-paced tech industry. This field goes beyond traditional accounting and reporting, delving into the strategic application of financial insights to drive business decisions, optimize resource allocation, and ultimately, create value.


What is Business-Oriented Financial Analysis and Management?

Business-oriented financial analysis and management involve utilizing financial data and tools to understand a company's performance, identify trends, predict future outcomes, and guide strategic decision-making. It's about translating numbers into actionable insights that support business goals.


Key aspects include:

  • Analyzing financial statements and reports: Understanding the balance sheet, income statement, and cash flow and other form of documents and statement to assess the company's financial health.

  • Evaluating key performance indicators (KPIs): Tracking metrics like revenue growth, profitability margins, customer acquisition cost (CAC), and customer lifetime value (CLTV) to measure performance and identify areas for improvement.

  • Forecasting and budgeting: Projecting future financial performance and allocating resources effectively to support growth initiatives.

  • Investment appraisal: Evaluating the financial viability of new projects and investments, considering factors like return on investment (ROI) and risk.

  • Risk management: Identifying and mitigating financial risks, such as market volatility, credit risk, and operational risks.


Why is Developing Internal Expertise Important?

Developing internal expertise in financial analysis and management offers significant advantages for companies:

  • Improved decision-making: Employees with strong financial acumen can make more informed decisions that align with the company's financial goals.

  • Enhanced performance: By understanding financial drivers and metrics, teams can focus on activities that improve profitability and efficiency.

  • Increased accountability: Financial awareness promotes a culture of accountability, where individuals understand the financial impact of their actions.

  • Stronger financial partnerships: Developing internal expertise enables better collaboration between finance and non-finance teams, leading to more effective financial strategies.

  • Competitive advantage: Companies with strong financial management capabilities are better equipped to navigate challenges, seize opportunities, and outperform competitors.


How Does This Benefit Careers?

Developing financial analysis and management skills can significantly enhance career prospects for both experts and managers, including those in non-financial roles:

  • Increased value: Employees with financial expertise are highly valued by employers, as they can contribute to strategic decision-making and drive business success.

  • Career advancement: Financial skills can open doors to new opportunities and leadership roles, as they demonstrate a broader understanding of the business.

  • Improved communication: Financial literacy enables better communication with finance teams and stakeholders, leading to more effective collaboration.

  • Entrepreneurial success: For those with entrepreneurial aspirations, financial management skills are essential for building and growing a successful business.

  • Personal financial management: The principles of financial analysis and management can also be applied to personal finances, leading to better financial well-being.


In conclusion, developing expertise in financial analysis and management, with a focus on business partnership, is invaluable for both companies and individuals in the tech industry. It empowers informed decision-making, drives performance, and unlocks new opportunities for growth and success.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at business or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.title: Modelowanie finansowe: Kompletny kurs finansów w Excelu
courseDetails.shortDescription: Praktyczny przypadek modelowania finansowego w Excel - Finanse, wycena i modelowanie finansowe
courseDetails.longDescription:
Jeśli interesujesz się karierą w finansach, taką jak Private Equity, fuzje i przejęcia (M&A), kontrola finansowa lub zarządzanie finansami, musisz zdawać sobie sprawę, że istnieje kluczowa umiejętność, którą trzeba opanować we wszystkich tych dziedzinach: modelowanie finansowe.

Nie ważne, czy tworzysz biznesplan, raport finansowy, czy dokonujesz wyceny firmy, ta umiejętność będzie niezbędna.

Ten kompleksowy kurs modelowania finansowego w Excelu dostarczy ci wiedzy, kodów i najlepszych praktyk, pozwalając na stworzenie przejrzystego, dobrze ustrukturyzowanego modelu w Excelu, który spełni oczekiwania banków inwestycyjnych, funduszy Private Equity i zespołów zarządzania finansami.

W trakcie tego szkolenia nauczysz się standardów modelowania finansowego i zasad, które należy przestrzegać, aby osiągnąć profesjonalne rezultaty.

Nauczysz się projektować kompleksowy model finansowy, obejmujący wiele scenariuszy inwestycyjnych, harmonogram długu z różnymi transzami finansowania i charakterystykami, przejrzystą tabelę źródeł i zastosowań środków, profesjonalny biznesplan oraz model wyceny firmy oparty na porównywalnych transakcjach, wykorzystując normatywną wartość EBITDA. Na zakończenie obliczymy IRR i przeprowadzimy jego analizę wrażliwości zgodnie z parametrami wyjścia z inwestycji.

Jeśli nie znasz jeszcze wszystkich tych pojęć, przedstawimy ich znaczenie przed rozpoczęciem modelowania finansowego w Excelu.

Kurs ten obejmuje podstawy finansów, które są niezbędne do opanowania, jeśli interesujesz się kontrolą finansową, analizą finansową lub karierą w sektorze transakcji (Private Equity, M&A, LBO, Transaction Services).
targetAudiences: Studenci finansów zainteresowani wysoce konkurencyjnymi obszarami finansów korporacyjnych, takimi jak Private Equity, Venture Capital, M&A, Leveraged Finance, ECM, Transaction Services, Restructuring, Valuation oraz oczywiście modelowanie finansowe.
Kandydaci do rozmowy kwalifikacyjnej w dziedzinie finansów, którzy chcą ćwiczyć i przygotować się do przypadków modelowania finansowego w Excel.
Stażystowie w dziedzinie finansów korporacyjnych, którzy chcą doskonalić swoje umiejętności finansowe, modelowania finansowego oraz obsługi Excela.
Młodsi analitycy w dziedzinie finansów korporacyjnych.
Starsi analitycy finansowi, którzy pragną zwiększyć swoją biegłość w modelowaniu finansowym z wykorzystaniem Excela.

If you use E-Mail ID or Mobile Phone, then this course is must for you !!

In today's digital world, the threat of cyberattacks is a big risk to both individuals and organizations. In this Course, We have covered:

  • Phishing Fundamentals: Gain a comprehensive understanding of phishing scams, including their types, techniques, and consequences for individuals and organizations.

  • Identification Tricks: Learn proven methods to identify suspicious e-mails and mobile messages, including phishing e-mails, SMS phishing (smishing), and social media scams.

  • Risk Assessment: Assess the potential risks caused by phishing attacks to your personal information, financial assets, and corporate data security.

  • Preventive Measures: Implement practical strategies and best practices to prevent phishing attacks, including security awareness training, email filtering, and mobile security protocols.

  • Response Protocols: Develop a proactive approach to respond to suspected phishing attempts, including reporting mechanisms, incident response procedures, and data breach mitigation strategies.

By the end of this course, you will be fully cable to identify identify and prevent Phishing Scams including E-Mail and mobile Phishing.

courseDetails.title: Finanzmodellierung: Vollständiger Finanzkurs in Excel
courseDetails.shortDescription: Praktischer Fall von Finanzmodellierung mit Excel - Geschäftsplan, Bewertung und Finanzmodellierung mit Excel - Finanzen
courseDetails.longDescription:
Wenn Sie eine Karriere im Finanzwesen anstreben, zum Beispiel in Private Equity, M&A, Finanzkontrolle oder Finanzmanagement, ist Ihnen sicherlich bewusst, dass in all diesen Bereichen eine Schlüsselfähigkeit erforderlich ist: Finanzmodellierung.

Egal, ob Sie einen Geschäftsplan erstellen, Finanzberichte vorbereiten oder eine Unternehmensbewertung durchführen, diese Fähigkeit ist unverzichtbar.

Dieser umfassende Kurs zur Finanzmodellierung mit Excel bietet Ihnen das Wissen, die Techniken und die besten Praktiken, um ein klares, gut strukturiertes Excel-Modell zu erstellen, das den Erwartungen von Investmentbanken, Private-Equity-Fonds und Finanzmanagementteams entspricht.

In dieser Schulung lernen Sie die Standards der Finanzmodellierung kennen sowie die Regeln, die Sie befolgen müssen, um ein professionelles Ergebnis zu erzielen.

Sie lernen, wie Sie ein umfassendes Finanzmodell erstellen, das mehrere Investitionsszenarien, einen Schuldenplan mit verschiedenen Finanzierungstranchen und deren Merkmalen, eine klare Quellen- und Mittelverwendungsübersicht, einen professionellen Geschäftsplan und ein Unternehmensbewertungsmodell basierend auf vergleichbaren Transaktionen unter Verwendung eines normativen EBITDA umfasst. Zum Abschluss berechnen wir den internen Zinsfuß (IRR) und passen ihn an die Parameter des Investment-Exits an.

Falls Sie mit diesen Konzepten noch nicht vertraut sind, werden wir deren Bedeutung klären, bevor wir mit der Finanzmodellierung in Excel beginnen.

Dieser Kurs deckt die wesentlichen Grundlagen des Finanzwesens ab, die Sie beherrschen müssen, wenn Sie sich für Finanzcontrolling, Finanzanalyse oder transaktionsbezogene Berufe wie PE, M&A und TS interessieren.

Finance course with subtitles in German
targetAudiences: Finanzstudenten, die sich für wettbewerbsintensive Bereiche der Unternehmensfinanzierung wie Private Equity, Venture Capital, M&A, Leveraged Finance, ECM, Transaction Services, Restrukturierung, Bewertung und natürlich Finanzmodellierung interessieren.
Kandidaten für ein Vorstellungsgespräch im Finanzbereich, die Excel-basierte Finanzmodellierungsfälle üben und vorbereiten möchten.
Praktikanten im Bereich Corporate Finance, die ihre Kenntnisse in Finanzen, Finanzmodellierung und Excel verbessern möchten.
Junior-Analysten im Bereich Unternehmensfinanzierung.
Senior-Finanzanalysten, die ihre Kompetenzen in der Finanzmodellierung mit Excel ausbauen möchten.

courseDetails.title: Power BI DAX Mastery: Advanced Formulas and Data Analysis
courseDetails.shortDescription: Mastering Complex Calculations and Dynamic Reporting in Power BI
courseDetails.longDescription:
"Power BI DAX Mastery" is an intensive training course designed to equip data analysts and business intelligence professionals with advanced skills in Data Analysis Expressions (DAX). This course provides a comprehensive understanding of DAX, enabling participants to build sophisticated data models, create complex calculations, and develop insightful Power BI reports.

Led by expert trainer Ali Noorani, this course focuses on practical applications, best practices, and hands-on problem-solving techniques. Participants will gain valuable insights into DAX's role in data modeling, visualization, and analytics, empowering them to drive data-driven decision-making within their organizations.

By the end of this course, attendees will have mastered advanced DAX functionalities, allowing them to perform in-depth data analysis and create dynamic, interactive reports that provide valuable business insights.

Course Outline:

  1. Introduction to Advanced DAX Concepts

    • Overview of DAX and its importance in Power BI.

    • Key differences between Calculated Columns and Measures.

    • Understanding the foundational principles of DAX.

  2. Building and Optimizing Data Models

    • Introduction to data modeling in Power BI.

    • Best practices for creating and managing data models.

    • Techniques for visualizing data effectively.

  3. Understanding and Applying Filter Context

    • Deep dive into filter context and its impact on DAX calculations.

    • How to use filter context to control data visibility and calculation results.

    • Practical examples of using filter context in real-world scenarios.

  4. Creating and Using Measures

    • Step-by-step guide to creating basic and advanced measures.

    • Techniques for using measures to perform dynamic calculations.

    • Examples of measures for common business scenarios (e.g., total sales, profit margin).

  5. Advanced Problem-Solving with DAX

    • Strategies for solving complex analytical problems using DAX.

    • How to use DAX functions such as CALCULATE, FILTER, and SUMX to solve business problems.

    • Case studies demonstrating the application of DAX for business insights.

  6. Implementing Time Intelligence Functions

    • Overview of time intelligence functions in DAX.

    • Techniques for calculating year-over-year growth, month-over-month trends, and moving averages.

    • Practical exercises to understand time-based calculations and forecasts.

  7. Dynamic Filtering and Interactive Reporting

    • How to implement dynamic filtering using slicers and DAX.

    • Creating interactive reports that respond to user selections.

    • Examples of dynamic reporting for different business dimensions (e.g., by region, by product category).

  8. Creating and Using Calendar Tables

    • Importance of calendar tables in time-based analysis.

    • How to create a calendar table using DAX.

    • Best practices for managing date-related data in Power BI.

  9. Practical Applications of DAX in Business Scenarios

    • Real-world examples of using DAX to address business needs.

    • How to create dashboards that provide actionable insights.

    • Techniques for using DAX to optimize business operations and strategy.
targetAudiences: Business Analysts looking to enhance their data modeling and reporting skills using advanced DAX formulas in Power BI.
Data Professionals who want to deepen their understanding of DAX for complex data calculations and insights.
Excel Power Users transitioning to Power BI and aiming to leverage their existing formula knowledge in a more powerful business intelligence tool.
Power BI Enthusiasts at an intermediate level who are ready to dive into more advanced DAX topics to unlock dynamic and insightful reporting capabilities.

Her research findings have been presented at esteemed institutions such as the School of Political and Social Sciences and the Stressed Out Conference at UCL, among others.

With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to driving positive change, Alex Amoroso is dedicated to empowering learners and professionals for usage of cutting edge methodologies for achieving of excellence in global business world.


Financial analysis is the process of evaluating businesses, projects, budgets, and other finance-related entities to determine their performance and suitability. It involves using various tools and techniques to assess the financial health of an organization, forecast future trends, and support decision-making.  


Key aspects of financial analysis include:

Assessing profitability: Evaluating a company's ability to generate profits over time, considering revenues, costs, and expenses.

Analyzing liquidity: Determining an organization's capacity to meet its short-term financial obligations and maintain sufficient cash flow.

Examining solvency: Assessing a company's long-term financial stability and ability to repay its debts.

Evaluating efficiency: Measuring how effectively a company utilizes its resources to generate revenues and manage expenses.

Forecasting future performance: Projecting financial outcomes based on historical data, market trends, and other relevant factors.


Importance of financial analysis skills for your career:

Improved decision-making: Financial analysis skills enable you to make informed decisions based on solid financial data, rather than relying on intuition or guesswork. This is crucial for choosing investments, managing budgets, and identifying growth opportunities.

Enhanced problem-solving: By understanding financial statements and analyzing trends, you can pinpoint areas of weakness or inefficiency within an organization and develop strategies to address them.

Increased career opportunities: Financial analysis skills are in high demand across various industries, opening doors to roles such as financial analyst, investment banker, portfolio manager, or management consultant.

Competitive advantage: Possessing strong financial analysis skills can differentiate you from other candidates in the job market and increase your earning potential.


Importance of financial analysis skills for building your own business:

Effective financial management: Understanding your company's financial performance is essential for making strategic decisions about pricing, marketing, product development, and resource allocation.

Securing funding: Investors and lenders rely on financial analysis to assess the viability and potential return on investment of your business. A strong financial track record and well-prepared financial projections can significantly increase your chances of securing funding.

Sustainable growth: By monitoring key financial metrics and identifying potential risks, you can make proactive adjustments to ensure the long-term sustainability and growth of your business.

Improved profitability: Financial analysis can help you identify areas where you can cut costs, increase revenues, and optimize your pricing strategy, ultimately leading to improved profitability.


In conclusion, financial analysis is a critical skill set that can significantly impact your career trajectory and your ability to build a successful business. Whether you're working for a large corporation or starting your own venture, honing your financial analysis skills can empower you to make informed decisions, solve complex problems, and achieve your financial goals.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at business or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT ve Yapay Zeka: kapsamlı yapay zeka eğitimi
courseDetails.shortDescription: Yapay Zekayı Öğrenin: ChatGPT, Dall-e, Claude, Gemini - yapay zeka hakkında kapsamlı rehber
courseDetails.longDescription:
ChatGPT ve Yapay Zeka Eğitimi:

Her güne, görevlerinizi benzersiz bir hız ve hassasiyetle yerine getirebilecek son derece yetenekli bir kişisel asistanla başlamak ister misiniz? E-postalarınızı, makalelerinizi veya raporlarınızı yazabilen, ilham verici görseller üretebilen, karmaşık verileri analiz edebilen, özel çözümler kodlayabilen ve çeşitli sorunları çözebilen bir yapay zeka ile çalışarak, gerçekten önemli olan konulara odaklanabilirsiniz.

Ancak, bu avantajlardan tam anlamıyla yararlanabilmek için yapay zekayı derinlemesine anlamak önemlidir. Pek çok kişi birkaç komut verip, yapay zekanın gerçek potansiyelini keşfetmeden süreci yarıda bırakıyor. Bunun arkasında genellikle, yapay zekadan en iyi sonuçları almanızı sağlayacak teknikler, yöntemler ve ince ayarlar hakkında bilgi eksikliği bulunur.

Bu eğitimin amacı, yapay zeka ile etkili bir şekilde iletişim kurabilmeniz, onu en iyi şekilde yapılandırmanız ve tam potansiyelinden faydalanmanız için size gerekli tüm araçları sunmaktır.

Bu hedefe ulaşmak için, yapay zekayı optimize ederek kullanmanız gereken temel bilgi ve becerileri kazanmanızı sağlayacak kapsamlı ve dinamik bir eğitim hazırladım.

Bu eğitim süresince birlikte şunları öğreneceğiz:

  • En iyi sonuçları almak için yapay zekaya nasıl net sorular sorulur.

  • ChatGPT'yi güvenilir öğretmeniniz, iş ortağınız veya analiz uzmanınız haline getirecek şekilde nasıl yapılandırılır.

  • Çalışmalarınızda daha üretken, hızlı, anlamlı ve etkili olmak için nasıl çeşitli fikirler üretebilirsiniz.

  • ChatGPT'nin çok yönlü kullanımından tam olarak faydalanmak için ona nasıl yazılır, nasıl konuşulur, nasıl dinlenir, ona görseller nasıl gönderilir ve nasıl yorumlanması istenir.

  • Dall-e veya Copilot'u en iyi görselleri üretmeleri için nasıl yönlendirebilirsiniz.

  • ChatGPT'nin ücretli sürümüne alternatif olarak hangi ilginç seçenekleri değerlendirebilirsiniz.

  • Copilot, Claude veya Gemini gibi diğer yapay zeka araçlarını da keşfedeceğiz.

  • ChatGPT'yi özel ihtiyaçlarınıza ve tercihinize göre nasıl özelleştirebilirsiniz.

  • ChatGPT'yi GPT’lerle nasıl güçlendirebileceğimizi göreceğiz: Bu uygulamaları nasıl kullanacağınızı ve hatta geliştirici olmadan nasıl oluşturabileceğinizi öğreneceksiniz.

  • Eğitimin sonunda, API yönetimi, Playground, ChatGPT’nin Excel veya Google Sheets gibi yazılımlara entegrasyonu gibi daha teknik konuları da ele alacağız.

  • Ve en önemlisi, tüm bunların başlangıç seviyesindeki kişiler için bile erişilebilir olduğunu göreceğiz.

Bu eğitimde şunları bulacaksınız:

  • Pratik ve somut gösterimler.

  • İndirilebilir teknik bilgiler ve pratik kılavuzlar.

[Güncelleme: GPT-4'ün yerini alan GPT-4o modelinin kullanımına dair videolar ekledim]

Kısacası, açık, erişilebilir ve ilgi çekici bir kursa başlamak üzeresiniz. Gerekli kavramları detaylı bir şekilde ele alan, ancak gereksiz uzunluğa kaçmayan bu eğitim, ChatGPT'yi tam anlamıyla öğrenmeniz için ihtiyacınız olan tek kaynak olacak. Başlangıç seviyeniz ne olursa olsun, ister yeni başlıyor olun ister ileri düzey teknikler arıyor olun, bu kurs size hitap edecek.


Tanıtımım:

Adım Yassine Rochd, binlerce öğrencinin profesyonel hedeflerine ulaşmasına yardımcı olan bir eğitim kuruluşunun kurucusuyum.

Teknolojiye büyük bir tutku duyuyorum. Finans alanında yüksek lisans yaptıktan ve danışmanlık ile yatırım fonları alanında deneyim kazandıktan sonra, web geliştirme konusunda eğitim aldım ve yüzlerce saatimi yapay zekayı keşfetmeye ve kullanmaya adadım.

Bugün, son birkaç yılda öğrendiklerimi size en anlaşılır şekilde aktarmayı hedefliyorum.


Sertifikasyon ve Garanti:

  • Bu eğitimi tamamladığınızda, LinkedIn'de bile paylaşabileceğiniz bir sertifika alacaksınız.

  • Eğitimimiz risksizdir; çünkü 30 günlük "memnuniyet garantisi" sunuyoruz.

  • Ayrıca, eğitime ve indirilebilir kaynaklara ömür boyu erişim hakkınız olacak.

Sizi daha etkili, daha üretken ve vazgeçilmez kılacak bu son derece faydalı teknolojiyi öğrenmek için sadece bir tık uzaktasınız.


Kursun Bölüm Detayları:

ChatGPT'ye Hızlı Başlangıç:

ChatGPT'yi yalnızca birkaç video ile hızla öğrenin. ChatGPT'nin sezgisel arayüzüne adım atın ve yapay zekanın gücünü tam anlamıyla kullanabilmek için ilk komutlarınızı nasıl oluşturacağınızı öğrenin. Tablo oluşturmadan beyin fırtınasına, fikir üretmeden metin çevirisi ve düzeltmeye kadar çeşitli içerikler oluşturmak için ChatGPT ile daha hızlı ve verimli olacaksınız. ChatGPT'nin iş arayışınızda size nasıl yardımcı olabileceğini ve profesyonel ihtiyaçlarınıza uyum sağlayarak verimliliğinizi nasıl artırabileceğini keşfedin. ChatGPT'nin e-postalar ve mektuplardan makalelere ve sosyal medya paylaşımlarına, hatta yazılım kodlamasına kadar birçok içerik oluşturma yeteneğine sahip olduğunu göreceksiniz.


Prompt Engineering'in Temelleri

Prompt engineering'in önemini ve ChatGPT'yi gerçek bir uzmana dönüştürme yöntemlerini keşfedin. Etkileşimlerinizi yapılandırmak için bağlamın ve hedeflerin rolünü anlayın; en iyi sonuçları elde etmek için format ve sıcaklık ayarlarını nasıl optimize edeceğinizi öğrenin. Ton ve stil kontrolü ile etkileşimlerinizi kişiselleştirin ve ChatGPT'den daha alakalı yanıtlar alabilmeniz için 5 pratik ipucunu uygulayın.


İleri Düzey Prompt Engineering Teknikleri

Bu bölümde, kendi kendine yeni promptlar üretebilen promptlar oluşturmayı öğreneceğiz. Reverse engineering (tersine mühendislik), web arama işlevleri, görüntü yorumlama teknikleri ve diğer birçok ileri düzey tekniği derinlemesine inceleyeceğiz.


Dall-e

Dall-e ile görsel oluşturma sürecine adım atacağız. Orta düzeydeki bir sonuçtan estetik ve ilham verici eserlere nasıl geçiş yapabileceğinizi, görüntülerin belirli bölümlerini basit ve hızlı bir şekilde nasıl değiştirebileceğinizi ve sonuçlarınızı nasıl optimize edebileceğinizi öğreneceksiniz. Ayrıca, bir çizgi roman ya da kurgusal karakterin sürekliliğini yaratmanıza olanak tanıyan ileri düzey teknikleri inceleyerek daha etkileyici sonuçlar elde edebileceksiniz.


ChatGPT ve Yapay Zekanın Sınırlarına Çözümler

ChatGPT ve diğer yapay zeka modellerinin belirli sınırlamaları ve zayıflıkları vardır. Bu bölümde, bu sınırlamaların neler olduğunu ve bunları nasıl aşabileceğinizi inceleyeceğiz.


ChatGPT'deki İlginç Özellikler

ChatGPT'yi işbirlikçi bir şekilde kullanabilmek için sohbetlerinizi paylaşma özelliklerini nasıl yapılandıracağınızı öğrenin. ChatGPT mobil uygulamasını en iyi şekilde kullanmak için sunduğu tüm seçenekleri keşfedin. Son olarak, yapay zeka ile benzersiz içerikler oluşturmanın ve her türlü intihal veya kopya içerikten kaçınmanın yollarını öğreneceksiniz.


Copilot ve Bing

Copilot, ChatGPT'nin ücretli ve gelişmiş özelliklerine birkaç ilginç alternatif sunar. Microsoft ve OpenAI iş birliği sayesinde, Bing arama motoruna entegre edilmiş ileri düzey yapay zeka özelliklerine nasıl erişebileceğinizi inceleyeceğiz.


Gemini, Claude, Mistral ve Diğerleri

Bir önceki bölümün devamı olarak, Google'ın Gemini'si veya Anthropic'in Claude'u gibi diğer yapay zeka modellerini inceleyeceğiz. Bu modellerin güçlü ve zayıf yönlerini değerlendirerek, hangi durumlarda ChatGPT yerine tercih edilebileceklerini göreceğiz.


ChatGPT Özel Talimatları (Custom Instructions)

ChatGPT'yi ihtiyaçlarınıza ve beklentilerinize göre nasıl özelleştireceğinizi öğrenin. Özel talimatlarınızı yapılandırarak etkileşimlerinizi nasıl kişiselleştirebileceğinizi keşfedin ve optimum kullanım için göz önünde bulundurmanız gereken önemli noktaları öğrenin.


GPT'ler

Bazı durumlarda ChatGPT'yi bile geride bırakabilen, son derece uzmanlaşmış mini uygulamalar olan GPT'lerin nasıl çalıştığını keşfedin. Kendi GPT'nizi adım adım nasıl oluşturacağınızı öğrenin. ChatGPT'nin yeteneklerini en üst düzeye çıkarmak için API çağrılarını nasıl yöneteceğinizi öğrenecek ve bölümün sonunda GPT'lerinizi nasıl paraya çevirebileceğinizi ve genel olarak ChatGPT ile nasıl gelir elde edebileceğinizi keşfedeceksiniz.


API Yönetimi ve Playground

ChatGPT'nin Playground'unu keşfedin ve sunduğu yeni özellikleri öğrenin. Artan zorluk seviyelerinde ChatGPT API'sine nasıl çağrı yapacağınızı öğrenin. Böylece ChatGPT'yi arayüz dışında kullanabilir, başka bir siteye chatbot yerleştirebilir veya ChatGPT'yi Google Sheets veya Excel gibi diğer yazılımlara entegre edebilirsiniz.
targetAudiences: Yapay zeka ve ChatGPT'yi öğrenmek isteyen herkes için, seviyeniz ne olursa olsun.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT e IA: Corso completo sull'IA generativa
courseDetails.shortDescription: Padroneggia l'IA: ChatGPT, Dall-e, Claude, Gemini - guida completa sull'intelligenza artificiale e le IA generative.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Formazione Completa su ChatGPT e IA Generative:

Siete pronti a iniziare ogni giornata con un alleato, un assistente personale estremamente abile, capace di svolgere i vostri compiti con una precisione e una rapidità senza pari?

Un'IA capace di scrivere email, articoli o rapporti, di creare immagini ispiratrici, di analizzare dati complessi, di programmare soluzioni su misura e di risolvere una moltitudine di problemi, permettendovi così di concentrarvi su ciò che conta davvero.

Per ottenere tutti questi benefici dall'IA, è necessario padroneggiarla. Molte persone si entusiasmano, provano 2 o 3 prompt e finiscono per abbandonare il tema senza scoprire il vero potenziale dell'intelligenza artificiale. Questo comportamento spesso è dovuto a una mancanza di conoscenza delle tecniche, dei metodi e delle configurazioni che permettono di ottenere i migliori risultati con l'IA.

L'obiettivo di questa formazione è quindi di fornirvi tutte le chiavi per comunicare efficacemente con l'IA, configurarla al meglio e sfruttarla appieno.

Per raggiungere questo scopo, ho progettato un percorso conciso e dinamico che vi permetterà di sviluppare le conoscenze e le competenze essenziali per l'utilizzo ottimizzato dell'IA.


Durante questa formazione, vedremo insieme:

  • Come formulare richieste chiare all'IA per ottenere le migliori risposte possibili.

  • Come configurare ChatGPT affinché diventi il vostro professore, co-fondatore o analista di fiducia.

  • Come generare molteplici idee e migliorare nel vostro lavoro, diventando più produttivi, più veloci, più pertinenti ed efficienti.

  • Come sfruttare appieno la multimodalità di ChatGPT per scrivergli, parlargli, ascoltarlo, trasmettergli immagini e chiedergli di interpretarle.

  • Come spingere Dall-e o Copilot a generare le migliori immagini possibili.

  • Come trovare alternative interessanti alla versione a pagamento di ChatGPT.

  • Esploreremo anche altre IA come Copilot, Claude o Gemini.

  • Vedremo come adattare ChatGPT alle vostre preferenze e bisogni specifici per risposte su misura.

  • Vedremo come potenziare ChatGPT grazie ai GPT: come utilizzare queste applicazioni e persino come crearle senza essere sviluppatori.

  • Esploreremo anche argomenti più tecnici alla fine della formazione, come la gestione delle API, il playground, l'integrazione di ChatGPT su altri software come Excel o Google Sheets, per esempio.

  • E soprattutto vedremo che tutto questo è accessibile a tutti, anche ai principianti.


In questa formazione troverete:

  • Dimostrazioni concrete.

  • Schede tecniche e guide pratiche scaricabili.

[Aggiornamento: Ho aggiunto video sull'uso del modello GPT4o, successore della versione GPT4]

In breve, vi apprestate a seguire un corso chiaro, accessibile e coinvolgente. Abbastanza dettagliato da coprire i concetti essenziali senza essere troppo lungo. Indipendentemente dal vostro livello di partenza, che siate principianti o alla ricerca di tecniche avanzate, questa è l'unica formazione di cui avrete bisogno per padroneggiare ChatGPT.


La mia presentazione:

Mi chiamo Yassine Rochd, sono il fondatore di un ente di formazione che ha aiutato migliaia di studenti a raggiungere i loro obiettivi professionali.

Sono anche appassionato di tecnologia. Dopo una laurea magistrale in finanza e esperienze nella consulenza e nei fondi di investimento, ho seguito una formazione in sviluppo web e trascorso centinaia di ore a scoprire e utilizzare le IA.

Oggi desidero trasmettervi nel modo più chiaro possibile ciò che ho imparato in questi anni.


Certificazione e garanzia:

Completando questa formazione, riceverete una certificazione che potrete anche condividere su LinkedIn. Questa formazione è inoltre senza rischi, grazie alla garanzia "soddisfatti o rimborsati" di 30 giorni. Avrete accesso a vita alla formazione, alle risorse scaricabili e ai futuri aggiornamenti. Siete a un clic di distanza dal padroneggiare una tecnologia estremamente utile che vi renderà più efficienti, più produttivi e semplicemente indispensabili.


Dettaglio delle diverse sezioni di questo corso:

Introduzione rapida a ChatGPT
Scoprite come padroneggiare rapidamente ChatGPT con poche video lezioni. Esplorate l'interfaccia intuitiva di ChatGPT e imparate a creare i vostri primi prompt per sfruttare appieno la potenza dell'IA. Che si tratti di generare tabelle, fare brainstorming, creare idee, tradurre e correggere testi o redigere vari contenuti, diventerete più veloci e performanti con l'IA. Scoprite come ChatGPT può assistervi nella ricerca di lavoro e adattarsi alle vostre esigenze professionali per aumentare la vostra efficienza. Vedrete che ChatGPT è capace di creare una varietà di contenuti, dalle email e lettere agli articoli e post per i social media, senza dimenticare la scrittura di codice informatico.

Le basi del prompt engineering
Imparate perché il prompt engineering è essenziale e come può trasformare ChatGPT in un vero esperto. Capite l'importanza del contesto e degli obiettivi per strutturare le vostre interazioni e scoprite come regolare il formato e la temperatura per ottimizzare i vostri prompt e variare il livello di creatività del modello. Personalizzate le vostre interazioni padroneggiando il tono e lo stile, e beneficiate di cinque consigli pratici per ottenere risposte ancora più pertinenti da ChatGPT.

Tecniche avanzate di prompt engineering
In questa sezione, vedremo come creare prompt che generano altri prompt. Studieremo il metodo del reverse engineering, le funzionalità di ricerca web, l'interpretazione delle immagini e molte altre tecniche avanzate.

Dall-e
Passeremo alla generazione di immagini con Dall-e. Vedrete come passare da un risultato mediocre a opere estetiche e ispiratrici, come modificare semplicemente e rapidamente porzioni di immagini e ottimizzare i vostri risultati. Studieremo anche tecniche avanzate che vi permetteranno, per esempio, di creare una continuità nella generazione di un personaggio di finzione o di fumetti, per risultati ancora più impressionanti.

Le soluzioni ai limiti di ChatGPT e dell'IA
ChatGPT e altri modelli di intelligenza artificiale presentano dei limiti e delle debolezze. Vedremo in questa sezione quali sono e come superarle.

Funzionalità interessanti di ChatGPT
Imparate a configurare le funzionalità di condivisione delle vostre conversazioni per un utilizzo collaborativo di ChatGPT. Sfruttate al meglio l'applicazione mobile ChatGPT, esplorando tutte le opzioni che offre. Infine, scoprite i metodi per creare un contenuto unico con l'IA evitando qualsiasi forma di plagio o contenuto duplicato.

Copilot e Bing
Copilot propone diverse alternative interessanti a funzionalità avanzate e a pagamento di ChatGPT. Vedremo come sfruttare la collaborazione tra Microsoft e OpenAI per accedere a funzionalità avanzate di intelligenza artificiale integrate nel motore di ricerca Bing.

Gemini, Claude, Mistral e altri
Nella continuità della sezione precedente, studieremo altre IA come Gemini di Google o Claude di Anthropic. Vedremo i loro punti di forza e di debolezza, e studieremo diversi casi d'uso per sapere quando preferirle a ChatGPT.

Istruzioni personalizzate di ChatGPT
Adattate ChatGPT alle vostre esigenze e aspettative. Imparate a personalizzare le vostre interazioni configurando le vostre istruzioni personalizzate. Scoprite anche i punti di attenzione da considerare per un utilizzo ottimale.

I GPT
Scoprite il funzionamento dei GPT, queste mini applicazioni iperspecializzate che a volte possono superare ChatGPT. Imparate a creare il vostro GPT passo dopo passo. Padroneggiate le chiamate API per massimizzare le capacità di ChatGPT e scoprite alla fine della sezione come monetizzare i vostri GPT e, più in generale, come guadagnare denaro grazie a ChatGPT.

Gestione delle API e Playground
Esplorate il playground di ChatGPT e scoprite le nuove funzionalità che offre. Imparate a chiamare l'API di ChatGPT con livelli di difficoltà crescenti. Potrete così utilizzare ChatGPT al di fuori dell'interfaccia, creare un chatbot su un altro sito o anche integrare ChatGPT in altri software come Google Sheets o Excel, per esempio.
targetAudiences: Chiunque desideri padroneggiare l'IA e ChatGPT. Questa formazione è per tutti i livelli.

courseDetails.title: 财务建模：Excel 中的完整财务课程 - 金融
courseDetails.shortDescription: Excel 财务建模实践案例和培训 - Excel 上的商业计划、估值和财务建模 - 金融
courseDetails.longDescription:
如果您对金融行业感兴趣，比如私募股权、并购、财务控制或财务管理，您必须已经意识到财务建模是这些领域中的一个关键技能。

无论您是在制定商业计划、财务报告还是进行公司估值，您都需要掌握这项技能。

这门关于 Excel 财务建模的综合课程将提供知识、技能和最佳实践，让您能够创建清晰、结构良好的 Excel 模型，满足投资银行、私募股权基金和财务管理团队的期望。

在本次培训中，您将学习财务建模的标准和实现专业结果所需遵循的规则。

您将学习如何设计一种包含多种投资情景的综合财务模型、含有多个融资层次和不同特征的债务时间表、清晰的资金来源与用途表、专业的商业计划，以及基于可比交易的规范 EBITDA 的公司估值模型。最后，我们将计算投资的内部收益率（IRR）并根据投资退出的参数对其进行敏感性分析。

当然，如果您对这些概念还不太熟悉，我们将在开始 Excel 财务建模之前先解释这些概念。

本课程覆盖了财务控制、财务分析或交易职业（私募股权、并购、TS）感兴趣的人必须掌握的金融基础知识。
targetAudiences: 对企业融资领域中的竞争激烈领域感兴趣的金融学生，例如私募股权、风险投资、并购、杠杆融资、ECM、交易服务、重组、估值，当然还有财务建模
准备金融面试并练习基于 Excel 的财务建模案例的候选人
企业财务实习生寻求提高财务、财务建模和 Excel 方面的技能
企业财务初级分析师
旨在通过 Excel 提高财务建模熟练程度的高级财务分析师

courseDetails.title: Finansal modelleme: Excel'de eksiksiz finans kursu
courseDetails.shortDescription: Excel'de finansal modelleme vaka çalışması - Excel'de iş planı, değerleme ve finansal modelleme
courseDetails.longDescription:
Eğer özel sermaye, M&A, finansal kontrol veya finansal yönetim gibi finans kariyerlerine ilgi duyuyorsanız, tüm bu alanlarda başarılı olmak için sahip olmanız gereken temel bir beceri olduğunu anlamışsınızdır: finansal modelleme. İş planı hazırlamak, finansal raporlama yapmak ya da şirket değerlemesi gerçekleştirmek gibi farklı işlemler için bu beceriye ihtiyacınız olacak.

Bu kapsamlı Excel'de finansal modelleme kursu, yatırım bankaları, özel sermaye fonları ve finansal yönetim ekiplerinin beklentilerini karşılayan açık, iyi yapılandırılmış bir Excel modeli oluşturmanız için gerekli bilgi, kod ve en iyi uygulamaları sunar.

Eğitim boyunca, finansal modelleme standartları ve profesyonel sonuçlar elde etmek için izlenmesi gereken kurallar hakkında bilgi edineceksiniz. Birden fazla yatırım senaryosu, çeşitli finansman dilimleri ve farklı özelliklere sahip bir borç planı, açık bir Kaynaklar ve Kullanımlar tablosu, profesyonel bir iş planı ve normatif bir FAVÖK kullanarak hazırlanmış karşılaştırılabilir işlemlere dayalı bir şirket değerleme modeli tasarlama üzerine eğitim alacaksınız. Ayrıca, IRR hesaplamasını yapacak ve yatırım çıkış parametrelerine göre duyarlılık analizi gerçekleştireceğiz.

Eğer bu kavramlarla henüz tanışık değilseniz, endişelenmeyin; Excel'de finansal modellemeye başlamadan önce bu terimlerin ne anlama geldiğini detaylıca inceleyeceğiz. Bu kursun amacı, finans sektöründe kariyer yapmak isteyenlerin kritik beceriler kazanmalarını sağlamaktır.

Bu kurs, özel sermaye, M&A, işlem hizmetleri gibi finansal kontrol, analiz veya işlemsel kariyerlere ilgi duyanlar için finans alanında uzmanlaşmanız gereken temel bilgileri kapsamaktadır.
targetAudiences: Özel sermaye, risk sermayesi, M&A, kaldıraçlı finansman, ECM, işlem hizmetleri, yeniden yapılandırma, değerleme ve finansal modelleme gibi kurumsal finansın rekabetçi alanlarına ilgi duyan finans öğrencileri.
Excel tabanlı finansal modelleme vakaları için pratik yapmak ve mülakatlara hazırlanmak isteyen finans alanında iş arayan adaylar.
Finans, finansal modelleme ve Excel alanlarındaki becerilerini geliştirmek isteyen kurumsal finans stajyerleri.
Kurumsal finans alanında çalışan genç analistler.
Excel kullanarak finansal modelleme konusundaki yetkinliklerini geliştirmeyi amaçlayan kıdemli finans analistleri.

courseDetails.title: Financial Modeling on Excel Complete finance course on Excel
courseDetails.shortDescription: Financial Modeling practical case and training on Excel - Business Plan, Valuation, and Financial Modeling on Excel
courseDetails.longDescription:
If you are interested in finance careers, such as Private Equity, M&A, financial controling or financial management, you've likely realized that one key skill is indispensable across all these finance fields: it's financial modeling.

Financial modeling is the cornerstone of finance, underpinning essential tasks such as developing Business Plans, generating reports in Excel, and valuing companies. The ability to create reliable and well-structured financial models is therefore crucial if you aim to pursue a career in corporate finance.

This is why many job interviews include technical cases on Excel. Within 30 minutes to an hour, employers can assess candidates by providing them with a computer and specific instructions, effectively identifying the top 10% who excel in financial modeling.

This comprehensive finance course on Excel will provide you with the knowledge, techniques, and best practices to create clear, well-structured models that meet the high standards of investment banks, Private Equity firms and financial management teams.

In this training, you will learn the standards and rules of financial modeling to produce professional, rigorous, optimized, and error-free outputs. You will be guided through designing a complete financial model with various investment and development scenarios for a company, including a debt schedule with multiple financing tranches, a Sources and Uses table, a clear Business Plan, and valuation using the transaction comparables method based on a normative EBITDA. Finally, we will calculate the IRR and analyze it according to investment exit parameters.

If these concepts are unfamiliar to you, we will cover them before diving into financial modeling in Excel. This course revisits essential finance fundamentals and the necessary knowledge you must master if you are interested in financial controlling, financial analysis, or transactional careers (PE, M&A, TS).

Instructor Introduction:

My name is Yassine, and I am the founder of a corporate finance training organization that has helped thousands of students and recent graduates prepare for interviews in Private Equity, investment banking, and consulting firms in Transaction Services, Valuation, and Financial Restructuring.

I am also a former Associate in Private Equity, having worked for two years in two different investment funds in Paris on small-cap operations across various sectors, including hospitality and real estate, tech and media, and renewable energy.

Additionally, I was a senior consultant in Valuation and Financial Modeling at EY, where I worked on multiple financial models in transactional contexts and investment projects.
targetAudiences: Finance students who are interested in highly competitive areas of corporate finance such as Private Equity, Venture Capital, M&A, Leveraged Finance, ECM, Transaction Services, Restructuring, Valuation, and, of course, financial modeling
Candidates for an interview in finance who want to practice and prepare for Excel-based financial modeling cases
Corporate finance interns seeking to enhance their skills in finance, financial modeling and Excel
Junior analysts in corporate finance
Senior finance analysts who aim to enhance their proficiency in financial modeling using Excel

courseDetails.title: Patent Strategies in Biotechnology - Protecting Innovations
courseDetails.shortDescription: Understanding Biotechnology Patents: Fundamentals, Legal Aspects, and Application Process
courseDetails.longDescription:
Course Overview

Biotechnology is a rapidly evolving field where innovation plays a crucial role in scientific advancements and commercial applications. Understanding how to protect these innovations through patents is essential for researchers, entrepreneurs, and professionals working in life sciences, pharmaceuticals, and related industries.

This course provides a structured introduction to the fundamentals of patents in biotechnology. It explores key concepts such as patentability criteria, the application process, legal frameworks, and ethical considerations. Participants will learn about intellectual property (IP) rights, different types of patents, and how they apply to biotechnological inventions. Through practical insights, the course will also address challenges faced in patent filing, enforcement, and commercialization.

Whether you are a researcher looking to safeguard your discoveries, a professional interested in IP law, or an entrepreneur navigating the biotech industry, this course will help you develop a foundational understanding of patents in biotechnology. You will gain insights into real-world case studies, enabling you to approach patenting with greater confidence and awareness.

By the end of this course, participants will have a clearer perspective on the role of patents in biotechnology and the steps involved in protecting intellectual property. No prior legal knowledge is required, making this course accessible to learners from various backgrounds.

Join us to explore the essentials of biotechnology patents and enhance your understanding of intellectual property in this dynamic field!
targetAudiences: Biotechnology Researchers & Scientists – Looking to protect their innovations through patents.
Students & Academics – Interested in intellectual property laws related to biotechnology.
Entrepreneurs & Startups – Exploring biotech innovation and patent strategies.
Legal & IP Professionals – Seeking insights into biotech-specific patenting processes.
Pharmaceutical & Healthcare Professionals – Engaged in R&D and product development.
Investors & Business Professionals – Understanding the role of patents in biotech commercialization.
